translations.wizard.title: Wizard
translations.wizard.description: The Alpha Wizard is the first adventurer to go searching for Grand Caster Mejulah. Will he be the spellcaster to find him?
translations.modal.demo.description: Are you sure you want to buy the Wizard for 1000 LADA?
translations.modal.spell.title: Cast a Spell!
translations.modal.spell.description: Visit the marketplace to buy a spell NFT, and redeem it to use in-game.
translations.modal.phase.title: First Turn Action
translations.modal.phase.description: By taking your first action this turn, you will move on to the ACTIONS phase. This will prevent you from equipping any more items to your characters this turn.
translations.modal.phase.reminder.title: Reminder
translations.modal.phase.reminder: To cast a spell, you must first equip a spellbook!
translations.modal.move.title: Make a Move!
translations.modal.move.description: Tap the glowing tile you want your spellcaster to move to.

translations.action.craft: Craft an item using gathered materials
translations.SPELL_MOVE: Remove the lock from this spellcaster's Move action for this turn.
translations.SPELL_UNLOCK: Unlock all actions on this spellcaster for this turn.
translations.SPELL_LOOT: Remove the lock from this spellcaster's Loot action for this turn.
translations.SPELL_CRIT: Perform a critical strike on your next loot this turn.
translations.SPELL_MAGIC: Increase Magic Chance by 20% this turn.
translations.SPELL_CRAFT: The next item you craft will be one level higher than its crafting materials
translations.SPELL_ITEM: Craft a new random item of Tier X
